channel.title: CVE Feed for Nota-Info -- Bookly
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Nota-Info -- Bookly

item.title: CVE-2023-26526|2024-05-17T06:41:23.723Z -- nota-info -- bookly
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Nota-Info Bookly allows Path Traversal, Manipulating Web Input to File System Calls.This issue affects Bookly: from n/a through 21.7.1.
